item.description:
Join us for Stump Team Trivia at Piccadilly Pub in Westborough located at 17 Connector Road.

Trivia starts at 8pm. We will meet at 7:30pm to get a spot.

Join us for drinks, food and a fun time playing team trivia. Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink.

Please look for Lori, if you have trouble finding us please call 781-710-5485.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Lori(see photo) If need to, please call 781-710-5485
item.name: Stump Trivia at Piccadilly Pub in Westborough - NEW Location for this week
